name: Star Desire
description:
Star Desire is a 2D Space Shooter that looks back in times of flash games with similar theme. There are no levels, only endless mode which makes Star Desire perfect time killer. All you need is just to eliminate your enemies to let the journey continue.

Enemies can drop buffs that will power up your spaceship for a little time.

There are four buffs you can get:

  • Heal buff - heals the player on fixed amount of HP.
  • Speed Buff - almost doubles shot speed of your spaceship.
  • Power Buff - doubles your damage while buff is active.
  • Second Weapon Buff - changes your weapon type. First type is weak but fast single direction blaster, when the second is slow but very harmful triple direction gun.
How to Play

All you need is just to download the archive you need.

  • Android - download APK and launch it to install.
  • Windows - download  a Windows Build, unzip it and run an ".exe" file.
  • Project - download a Unity Project , unzip it and open through Unity Hub.
